dmca.title: [ABUSE] Report Abuse
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2006 6:48 PM
To: tab@cmgsccc.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Report Abuse]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Report Abuse
Date:         Tue, 11 Apr 2006 13:05:55 -0500
From:         tab <tab@cmgsccc.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



This site hosted on one of your servers stole all my cartoon dolls from my
glittermaker site.

Here's their page: http://www.123glitter.com/doll-glitter-maker/

Here's mine: http://www.glitterkiss.com/scripts/red-font2.php

You can see the doll thumbnails, when you click on one it puts the specific
doll in the word thats being created.
They even had the nerve to take my thumbnail layout.
This is unbelievable, I'd really appreciate if something could be done.

And all the other 123 sites they're running have nothing but stolen content
on it as well, nothing made by me but I thought I'd mention it anyways.

Thank you,
T.Black


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEPEAWvK/XpJs6oyURAoQcAJ0Vu2lugo0/AQuulRaQ5YIyOyFNrgCeLhnr
sS2dZtF4U0ICXYOXtiHC3QA=
=cRdR
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
